investors.description: Extracts a list of all investors, including subscribers (Teckningsåtagare) and guarantors (Garantiåtagande), using a detailed, multi-level extraction logic.
investors.semantic_search_query: Section or table listing investor names, subscription commitments (teckningsåtaganden or teckningsförbindelser), and guarantee commitments (garantiåtaganden or garanti)

important_dates.description: Extracts all relevant dates including subscription periods, trading dates, and record dates.
important_dates.semantic_search_query: Tidsplan eller tidplan med viktiga datum (avstämningsdag, teckningsperiod, IPO trading date, handel med teckningsrätter)

offering_terms.description: Extracts financial terms, ratios, price, and volume.
offering_terms.semantic_search_query: Villkor för erbjudandet (teckningskurs, teckningsrelation, erbjuden volym, interval, over-allotment, non-cash consideration)

offering_outcome.description: Extracts the outcome of the offering, including subscription percentages and final amounts.
offering_outcome.semantic_search_query: Slutgiltigt utfall i erbjudandet eller börsnoteringen (tecknat med stöd av rätter, utan stöd av rätter, garanter, total teckning, over-allotment allocation)

flag_investors_changed.description: Flag if there have been changes to investors since the initial announcement.

issue_type_guidance.Rights issue: This is a RIGHTS ISSUE (Företrädesemission). Only grab data related to the rights issue.
issue_type_guidance.Direct issue: This is a DIRECT ISSUE (Riktad emission). Only grab data related to the direct issue.
issue_type_guidance.IPO: This is an INITIAL PUBLIC OFFERING (Börsnotering). Only grab data related to the IPO.
issue_type_guidance.Warrant: This is a WARRANT EXERCISE (Teckningsoptioner). Only grab data related to the warrant exercise.
issue_type_guidance.Non-cash issue: This is a NON-CASH ISSUE (Apportemission). Only grab data related to the non-cash issue.
